name: University that kills
description:
University that kills is a short pixel art  game that tells the story of Daniele, a university student like many others, who meets another student, Haru, during a vacation in Japan.

A quiet evening in a pub turns into a moment of reflection and venting for both.

Duration: 

5-10 min

Languages: 

English, Italian

Content warnings: 

Mention of mental disorders, Mention of suicide
